accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

did.unittitle: Commemorative material collected by Anna Marie Landolfo
Item 1: Factory fire horror that killed 146.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Newspaper article from the New York Daily News, March 25, 2011. Includes a photograph of Anna Marie Landolfo. News clipping

did.unittitle: Item 2: Susan Harris: Remembering Their Prayers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Post card for the Harris performance at the New York City Fire Museum on March 26, 2011. Postcard

did.unittitle: Item 3: Susan Harris: Remembering Their Prayers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Post card for the Harris performance at the New York City Fire Museum on March 26, 2011. Copy 2. Postcard

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A broadside advertising the dramatic oratorio created in honor of the centennial of the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire. Performed March 23-27, 2011 at the Judson Memorial Church by the Eugene Lang College, the New School for Liberal Arts. Broadsides

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A program for the dramatic oratorio created in honor of the centennial of the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire. Performed March 23-27, 2011 at the Judson Memorial Church by the Eugene Lang College, the New School for Liberal Arts. Program
